pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Samurai (2011, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft the Red Ranger's $(l:samurai/devices/samuraizers#red_samuraizer)Red Samuraizer$(/l) $(br2)Used to access the Red Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_red)Base$(/l) forms $(br2)Used to craft the Red (Female) Ranger's $(l:samurai/devices/samuraizers#princess_samuraizer)Red (Female) Samuraizer$(/l) $(br2)Used to access the Red (Female) Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_princess)Base$(/l) forms
Drops from $(l:samurai/mobs/moogers)Moogers$(/l)

Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Super Samurai (2012, TV show) ($br2) Used to access the Samurai Red Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_red#super_samurai_red)Super$(/l) forms Samurai Blue Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_blue#super_samurai_blue)Super$(/l) forms Samurai Pink Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_pink#super_samurai_pink)Super$(/l) forms Samurai Green Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_green#super_samurai_green)Super$(/l) forms Samurai Yellow Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_yellow#super_samurai_yellow)Super$(/l) forms Samurai Gold Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_gold#super_samurai_gold)Super$(/l) forms Samurai Red (Female) Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_princess#super_samurai_princess)Super$(/l) forms
Drops from $(l:misc/ores/deepslate_power_disc_ore)Deepslate Power Disc Ore$(/l)

Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Super Samurai (2012, TV show) ($br2) Used to access the Samurai Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/samurai_red#samurai_red_shark_attack)Shark Attack Mode$(/l) forms Please note this works with all Samurai rangers ($br2) the Red RPM Ranger's $(l:samurai/rangers/rpm_red#rpm_red_shark_attack)Shark Attack Mode$(/l) forms
Drops from $(l:misc/ores/power_disc_ore)Power Disc Ore$(/l)

Drops from $(l:misc/ores/power_disc_ore)Power Disc Ore$(/l)
